alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:13PM CDT until July 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chilton County in central Alabama... Southwestern Coosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 713 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Chilton County Motor Sports Park to near Gap Of The Mountain, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clanton, Thorsby, Billingsley, Plecher, Mitchell Lake, Gap Of The Mountain, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Higgins Ferry Park, Verbena, Pooles Crossroads, Lomax, I 65 Rest Area, Mitchell Dam, Isabella and Cooper. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
